title: NewsBreak: FedEx Tumbles Postmarket After Lowering Guidance
text:
NewsBreak: FedEx Tumbles Postmarket After Lowering Guidance

Stock Markets 3 hours ago (Sep 18, 2019 04:27)

© Reuters. Investing.com - FedEx (NYSE: ) shares dropped in after-hours trading after the company cut its 2020 earnings forecast in the face of trade tensions and global economic uncertainty. FedEx (NYSE: ) said it now expects to earn $11 to $13 per share for 2020, compared with the consensus estimate of $14.62 from S&P Capital IQ. The stock fell 7.8% postmarket. FedEx (NYSE: ) reported a quarterly of $3.05 per share, shy of forecasts compiled by Investing.com of $3.17 per share. Revenue of $17.05 billion was slightly below expectations of $17.09 billion.

NewsBreak: FedEx Tumbles Postmarket After Lowering Guidance
